main event: A witness observed three lights in the sky near Holland, Missouri, on March 8, 1967, for a duration of 20 minutes, with a triangular shaped object reportedly landing southward.
interesting points: The triangular object was larger than a plane at a distance of approximately one mile., The lights emitted a bright light., One object remained stationary while two others maneuvered around it., The observation could possibly be related to a KC-135 aircraft conducting simulated landings in the area., The observer was a reliable witness, aged 16, from Caruthersville, Missouri.
sighted object: three lights and a triangular shaped object
